posts.post_content:
From landboysteve: "Without trample of some kind of evasion this card is so-so in limited and virtually unplayable in constructed. What a waste of paper."  
  
Almost every creature would be *better* with evasion or trample. That doesn't mean it's a waste of paper for not having it. Quit being lazy: Just give it evasion or trample if you think it needs it! [Whispersilk Cloak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Whispersilk Cloak) gives it evasion and protection, as does [Akroma's Memorial](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Akroma's Memorial), and the memorial, [Loxodon Warhammer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Loxodon Warhammer), [O-Naginata](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=O-Naginata), and [Sword of Vengeance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sword of Vengeance) all provide trample and are just awesome anyway. None of the ones I mentioned have any color requirements, so they fit in any deck the juggernaut does. All of them are artifacts, so they make the juggernaut bigger.
posts.html:
From landboysteve: "Without trample of some kind of evasion this card is so-so in limited and virtually unplayable in constructed. What a waste of paper."

Whispersilk Cloak gives it evasion and protection, as does Akroma's Memorial, and the memorial, Loxodon Warhammer, O-Naginata, and Sword of Vengeance all provide trample and are just awesome anyway. None of the ones I mentioned have any color requirements, so they fit in any deck the juggernaut does. All of them are artifacts, so they make the juggernaut bigger.

Posted By: darkrai88 (11/7/2010 10:49:37 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I relied on this card as a finisher for me in a draft. The deck was full of [Revoke Existence](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Revoke Existence)s, [Wall of Tanglecord](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wall of Tanglecord)s and [Ezuri's Archers](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ezuri's Archers) for defense, plus a [Sylvok Replica](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sylvok Replica) and a few big green creatures and equipment... I figured I had enough removal and defense that I could last until late game and then roll with this guy and my green creatures.   
  
I always made it to the late game, but this never worked as a finisher. On two occasions I decked myself with this equipped by an [Infiltration Lens](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Infiltration Lens). Nothing's better than attacking six times with a 7/7, drawing two cards each time, and not breaking through once because of stupid chump blockers.   
  
Too expensive and unreliably-sized for a mid-game distraction, too blockable for a finisher.
posts.html:
I relied on this card as a finisher for me in a draft. The deck was full of Revoke Existences, Wall of Tanglecords and Ezuri's Archers for defense, plus a Sylvok Replica and a few big green creatures and equipment... I figured I had enough removal and defense that I could last until late game and then roll with this guy and my green creatures.

I always made it to the late game, but this never worked as a finisher. On two occasions I decked myself with this equipped by an Infiltration Lens. Nothing's better than attacking six times with a 7/7, drawing two cards each time, and not breaking through once because of stupid chump blockers.

Too expensive and unreliably-sized for a mid-game distraction, too blockable for a finisher.
